00036  * Implementation of cl_page for LOV layer.

00042 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOV
00043 
00044 #include "lov_cl_internal.h"
00045 
00050 /*****************************************************************************
00051  *
00052  * Lov page operations.
00053  *
00054  */
00055 
00056 static int lov_raid0_page_print(const struct lu_env *env,
00057                                 const struct cl_page_slice *slice,
00058                                 void *cookie, lu_printer_t printer)
00059 {
00060         struct lov_page *lp = cl2lov_page(slice);
00061 
00062         return (*printer)(env, cookie, LUSTRE_LOV_NAME"-page@%p, raid0\n", lp);
00063 }
00064 
00065 static const struct cl_page_operations lov_raid0_page_ops = {
00066         .cpo_print = lov_raid0_page_print
00067 };
00068 
00069 int lov_page_init_raid0(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00070                         struct cl_page *page, pgoff_t index)
00071 {
00072         struct lov_object *loo = cl2lov(obj);
00073         struct lov_layout_raid0 *r0 = lov_r0(loo);
00074         struct lov_io     *lio = lov_env_io(env);
00075         struct cl_object  *subobj;
00076         struct cl_object  *o;
00077         struct lov_io_sub *sub;
00078         struct lov_page   *lpg = cl_object_page_slice(obj, page);
00079         loff_t             offset;
00080         loff_t                   suboff;
00081         int                stripe;
00082         int                rc;
00083         ENTRY;
00084 
00085         offset = cl_offset(obj, index);
00086         stripe = lov_stripe_number(loo->lo_lsm, offset);
00087         LASSERT(stripe < r0->lo_nr);
00088         rc = lov_stripe_offset(loo->lo_lsm, offset, stripe,
00089                                &suboff);
00090         LASSERT(rc == 0);
00091 
00092         lpg->lps_stripe = stripe;
00093         cl_page_slice_add(page, &lpg->lps_cl, obj, index, &lov_raid0_page_ops);
00094 
00095         sub = lov_sub_get(env, lio, stripe);
00096         if (IS_ERR(sub))
00097                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub));
00098 
00099         subobj = lovsub2cl(r0->lo_sub[stripe]);
00100         list_for_each_entry(o, &subobj->co_lu.lo_header->loh_layers,
00101                             co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00102                 if (o->co_ops->coo_page_init != NULL) {
00103                         rc = o->co_ops->coo_page_init(sub->sub_env, o, page,
00104                                                       cl_index(subobj, suboff));
00105                         if (rc != 0)
00106                                 break;
00107                 }
00108         }
00109         lov_sub_put(sub);
00110         RETURN(rc);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static int lov_empty_page_print(const struct lu_env *env,
00114                                 const struct cl_page_slice *slice,
00115                                 void *cookie, lu_printer_t printer)
00116 {
00117         struct lov_page *lp = cl2lov_page(slice);
00118 
00119         return (*printer)(env, cookie, LUSTRE_LOV_NAME"-page@%p, empty.\n", lp);
00120 }
00121 
00122 static const struct cl_page_operations lov_empty_page_ops = {
00123         .cpo_print = lov_empty_page_print
00124 };
00125 
00126 int lov_page_init_empty(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00127                         struct cl_page *page, pgoff_t index)
00128 {
00129         struct lov_page *lpg = cl_object_page_slice(obj, page);
00130         void *addr;
00131         ENTRY;
00132 
00133         cl_page_slice_add(page, &lpg->lps_cl, obj, index, &lov_empty_page_ops);
00134         addr = kmap(page->cp_vmpage);
00135         memset(addr, 0, cl_page_size(obj));
00136         kunmap(page->cp_vmpage);
00137         cl_page_export(env, page, 1);
00138         RETURN(0);
00139 }
